      • findApplicationConfigs

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
List<ApplicationConfig> findApplicationConfigs()
        Returns all stored application configurations.
        Returns:
        a list of application configurations.

      • getApplicationConfig

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
ApplicationConfig getApplicationConfig(String application)
        Return the configuration for given application. If the configuration is not stored a new ApplicationConfig object is created and returned (but not stored).
        Parameters:
        application - application name.
        Returns:
        an application configuration.

      • mergeApplicationConfig

        @Transactional
void mergeApplicationConfig(ApplicationConfig applicationConfig)
        Persists the given configuration application. If a configuration object is already stored under a given application name that configuration is updated.
        Parameters:
        applicationConfig - the application configuration to persist.
